channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump says Illinois governor and Chicago mayor should be jailed as they oppose Guard deployment
item.description: President Donald Trump says the Illinois governor and Chicago mayor should be jailed as they oppose his deployment of National Guard troops for his immigration and crime crackdown in the nation’s third-largest city.

item.title: Illinois leaders are waiting to see what’s next with Trump’s use of National Guard
Authorities charge man with sparking deadly January wildfire that leveled LA neighborhoods
